settings.hero_description: Understand your bladder filling status with our bladder sensor and app.

settings.feature_description: With its comfortable and discreet design, you can wear our bladder sensor without any inconvenience, and get on                     with your day-to-day activities without any interruptions.
settings.feature_item_1: Small and thin design - like a pack of playing cards (±75x61x14mm)

settings.benefits_title: Understand and take control of your bladder
settings.benefit_1_description: With our sensor, you can get to know your bladder better, and actively control to improve it
settings.benefit_2_description: Create automatic statistics of your voidings to understand your personal patterns.
settings.benefit_3_description: Sensa provides peace of mind and security, so you can go about your day with confidence.
settings.benefit_4_description: Get discreet vibrations when it's time to go to the bathroom, to ensure your privacy.
settings.benefits_image_alt: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam non.

settings.cta_title: Wonder if our bladder sensor is for you?
settings.cta_description: Start doing our 2 minute test to see how our bladder sensor can help you.

settings.app_details_description: Set up your digital voiding diary and get smart push notifications on your phone and your wrist.

settings.feature_image_right_description: The app includes a comprehensive bladder training course that is tailored to your individual needs.                     The program will guide you through a series of exercises and techniques to help you strengthen your                     bladder muscles and reduce symptoms. With regular practice, you can expect to see significant                     improvements in your bladder control over time.

settings.feature_image_left_description: If you need additional support, the app allows you to connect with a specialist who can provide you                     with personalized advice and guidance. Whether you have questions about your condition or need help                     managing symptoms, our experts are here to help.

settings.feature_image_right_description: The app allows you to keep track of your bathroom habits, including when you go to the toilet, how                     much you drink, and how much you void. This voiding data will be share via the sensor automatically.                     No manual logs needed. This information can be used to monitor your progress and identify patterns                     that may be contributing to your incontinence to develop effective treatment strategies.

settings.feature_image_left_description: The app includes smart notifications that reminds you when it's time to go to the bathroom and gives                     proactive estimations.With these reminders, you can avoid accidents and maintain greater control                     over your bladder. Additionally, the app provides notifications when it's time to perform bladder                     training exercises, ensuring that you stay on track with your bladder training program.

settings.monthly_plan_description: Rent your bladder sensor: Monthly Plan

settings.quarterly_plan_description: Rent your bladder sensor: Quarterly Plan

settings.one_time_purchase_explainer: Please contact our sales team for more information.                         Necessary adhesive materials can be bought seperately at our Sensa Online Shop.

settings.pricing_description_append: per month on incontinence pads and pants. We believe SENSA should be accessible to everybody with a simple pricing.
settings.pricing_hint_terms_taxes: Prices in GBP. Taxes may apply.

settings.faq_accordion_question: Is the sensor visible under my (tight) clothes, e.g. sport apparel?
Will it interfere with my belt?
Does it work with body hair?
Will the vibration stimulate my bladder?
Do notifications work as pre-warning? How much time do I get?
Can it fall of while running, doing sports activities?
Can I wear it at night?
Will the sensor prevent me from using absorptive products?
How long can I use the sensor?
Why a deposit? When do I get it back?
